game_description: Welcome to Babbling Baboons! Inspired by Gorilla Tag, use your hands to move and be baboon :), play with friends, goof around with the mirror, camp in the cave, hike up the very tippy top of the tallest mountain, swim around in the sea, and have a blast playing!
review_1: Hey,I've been trying to play with my friend and it doesn't let us play together,why is this?
review_2: Geobyte is taking a break from making the game that’s why their has not been an update in a while
review_3: No multiplayer = time alone = unlocking 100% of your brain = you turn into god = you own all multiverses = you can go to a multiverse with multiplayer 😁😁😁😁😃😃😃😃😀😀😀😀😄😄😄😄😋😋😋🙂🙂🙂🙂
review_4: When I download the game it starts to download then it says installing but right after that it just says not downloaded and it’s a never ending cycle
review_5: Horror is actually fun because it gives you the thrills and I love horror I will be so happy if you add horror and fun game!
